By poverty level

Of the 516 caregivers of children with a single, 124 report an income below the poverty threshold for their household size and 145 report an income above the threshold.

By geographic region

Caregiver anxiety

Caregiver depression

Caregiver stress

Child externalizing

Child internalizing

By childcare

Of these caregivers, 62 have non-family childcare and 454 do not.

Of these caregivers, 215 have family childcare and 301 do not.
